title: Jungle Gamemode
body: Wouldn't it be cool if there was a jungle only map where Assassin's are made for. Imagine only fog of war, a map as big as SR no lanes just small camps and Objectives such as Dragon or Baron and if they would take like 10 camps as a team they'll get a little bonus or at 10 kills or so? Might be considerable right :3?

replies.body: Seems like an interesting game mode.
